accurate__info.message: Reputable source with no disagreement and no related false claims

accurate_with_considerations__info.message: Reputable source with little disagreement and related false claims

unsubstantiated__info.message: Mixture of reputability and disagreement associated to claim reviews

inaccurate__info.message: Not credible source with high disagreement

not_verifiable_post__info.message: Absolutely not a credible source with highly-biased content

tweet_tagged_as.message: This tweet has been tagged as %s

provide_claim.message: If you think this is not accurate please provide a claim and a URL to a post that supports that claim.

provide_additional_info.message: Please provide some additional information in the comment
